title: Yellow! Can someone please help me identify this font?
author: Susana Bento

comments.content:
Almost impossible to ID from a single letter. Similar typefaces:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-hensler/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-hensler/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-hensler/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-bq/")  
 [http://www.type-together.com/Alverata](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150540/http:/www.type-together.com/Alverata "http://www.type-together.com/Alverata")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/elan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/elan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/elan/")  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/grant\_avenue/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150540/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/grant_avenue/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/grant\_avenue/")
